result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert Francis Schultz II

records.addlTxt: Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk. M.Burke. DE is finishing his AODA. DE needs to bring proof of completion at the next hearing. Court advises DE that due to him living in Milwaukee he is not eligible for Huber/ELM. He would have to try to set up a transfer to Milwaukee County. STC set to 12/14/22 at 9:00.
Assessment of Costs for Blood Draws/Prosecution Costs

Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person. DE dows not have an attorney. The state is going to talk with the DE to see if they can come to a resolution. STC set to 09/02/22 at 9:30.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
Assessment of Costs for Expert Laboratory Analysis and Witness Fees

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *Not to drive w/o VALID Driver's License.

143M   State appeared by Attorney Drew Lehman.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.  Plea of Not Guilty entered by the court. Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 24, 2022 at 01:45 pm.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 10:00 am. $1100  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).  sg
